snippet: At first, Penn State’s players felt they deserved better than an invitation to the TicketCity Bowl, but they have welcomed the chance to focus on football.
abstract: Penn State and Houston prepare to meet in college football's TicketCity Bowl, with both teams looking for their own brand of redemption.
lead_paragraph: At first, Penn State’s players felt they deserved better than an invitation to the TicketCity Bowl, but they have welcomed the chance to focus on football.

headline.seo: TicketCity Bowl Is Second Chance for Penn State and Houston
headline.main: Penn State and Houston Savor a Second Chance
headline.print_headline: Penn State and Houston Savor a Second Chance
